p: In addition, antioxidant and antimicrobial chemistry are interesting topics at present because they play a pivotal role in pathogenesis of cardiovascular diseases, neural disorders, cancer, and aging [ 11]. Consequently, a majority of the reports also have focused on biological characteristics and compositions of essential oil extracted from various other plants [ 4, 8, 11, 12], such as Rosmarinus officinalis, A. capillaris, and Z. officinale, but there was few information about the essential oil of C. citronella leaves essential oil in the literature.
